com.sloman.rs.skocko.adapter

Class SymbolAdapter

  • com.sloman.rs.skocko.adapter.SymbolAdapter

  • public class SymbolAdapter

    Used for creating, populating, modifying RecyclerView

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SymbolAdapter.DiffCallback 
      static class  SymbolAdapter.OnClickListenerSymbol
      Custom listener that handles clicks on RecyclerView items. Passes the class Symbol associated with the current item to the SymbolAdapter.OnClickListenerSymbol.onClick function.
      static class  SymbolAdapter.SymbolViewHolder
      The SymbolViewHolder constructor takes the binding variable from the associated item, which nicely gives it access to the full class Symbol information.
